name: SMART+ Saturday
description: SMART+ offers FREE and engaging learning experiences tailored for San Francisco Middle School students year-round. This unique program is designed to nurture the creativity of youth and connect them with local Black entrepreneurs, provide STEAM lessons, and provide representative mentorship through nature, financial literacy, life skills, and community building.
